item.title: Big error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok so if ound soemthing that shouldnt be there. hereâ€™s the general are of the code:

else if (NPCID == 527) { /*Shopkeeper Assistant*/ skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; if((cluelevel == 1) && (cluestage == 1) && (clueid == 4)) { NpcWanneTalk = 31; } else { sendMessage("The shop assistant isn't interested in talking right now..."); } *****Supposed to be another } here***** else if (NPCID == 220) { /*Fisher King*/ skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; if((cluelevel == 1) && (cluestage == 4) && (clueid == 1)) { NpcWanneTalk = 31; } else { sendMessage("The Fisher King isn't interested in talking right now..."); } } else if (NPCID == 542) { /*Al Kharid Legs Shopkeeper*/ skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; if((cluelevel == 1) && (cluestage == 4) && (clueid == 2)) { NpcWanneTalk = 31; } else if((cluelevel == 2) && (cluestage == 1) && (clueid == 5)) { NpcWanneTalk = 31; } else if((cluelevel == 2) && (cluestage == 5) && (clueid == 2)) { NpcWanneTalk = 32; } else { sendMessage("The shop keeper isn't interested in talking right now..."); } } yet when i put another } there, it gives me 64 errors. any help on that?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2007, 04:37:51 PM[/size][hr]please someone help me fix this. IM BEGGIN MAN!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Big error
item.dc:creator: @katzcinky katzcinky
item.description:
@katzcinky wrote:

simple.

client.java:19779: 'else' without 'if' else if (NPCID == 220) { /*Fisher King*/ ^ client.java:19870: orphaned case case 17: //second Click npc ^ client.java:20300: orphaned case case 72: //Click to attack ^

see where it says:

else if (NPCID == 220) { /*Fisher King*/

?

take out the { and that should solve some problems, cause theres no } to end it, and u dont need it there. it is screwing evrything else up and making the cases separate from the script.
